page.title: 03BRISCO HALL FARM _ BRISCO
page.content: Mr.Coulthard's family have owned the farm for four generations(since 1890). It is quite large for the area,600 acres,and in all consists of 38 fields.At one time it was a{dairy farm but he now rears{beef cattle.}He also used to grow barley,oats and wheat but now he grows mainly barley to help feed the cattle. He starts work at 7.00am and in winter finishes at about 5.30pm.In the summer and at calving time he works much longer hours and is sometimes up all night. {******************************} The house that Mr.Coulthard's family live in is 17th century.Over the front door is carved "TPMP 1610".Bonnie Prince Charlie slept there for one night on his way back to Scotland after his defeat by the Duke of Cumberland.
